# Theming

## Configuring the theme

Theming is built in using [Styled-components](https://github.com/styled-components/styled-components).
You need to make the theme available to the components by wrapping your application in a `ThemeProvider`:

```jsx
import { ThemeProvider } from 'styled-components';
import { Button, mainTheme } from 'da-design-system';

export default function App() {
  return (
    <ThemeProvider theme={mainTheme}>
      <Button variant="primary">I am just a button!</Button>
    </ThemeProvider>
  );
}
```

Da-design-system is using [tailwindcss](https://tailwindcss.com/) as it's default theme.
The `main` theme provided includes [tailwindcss default theme](https://tailwindcss.com/docs/theme) and some additional custom tokens.

## Custom theme
To add a new custom theme check the `main` theme as reference under `src/theme/main`
